author: Tan Lee Meng J:
counsel: Lawrence Teh Kee Wee and Loh Jen Wei (Rodyk and Davidson) for applicant; Sarjit Singh Gill SC (Shook Lin and Bok), Matthew Saw and Mervyn Foo (Lee and Lee) for respondent in Civil Appeals Nos 57 and 73 of 2004; Lim Yew Jin (State Counsel) for Attorney-General; Pradeep Kumar Gobind (K S Chia Gurdeep and Param) for Law Society of Singapore
tags-parsed: Legal Profession/Admission/Ad hoc/Admission of Queen's Counsel/Whether issues raised in appeals sufficiently difficult or complex to warrant admission of Queen's Counsel/Section 21(1) Legal Profession Act (Cap 161, 2001 Rev Ed).
